content:
It looks like we're in the midst of a second scheduling snafu. The HL7 calendar says that our call started 10 minutes ago, but a recent call reminder to the InM list says that it starts in 50 minutes.
cc @Catie Ladd , @Gino Canessa , @Bas van den Heuvel , @Eric Martin , @Jonathan Whitby , @Anthony(Tony) Julian

In addition to continuing our design discussions on content sharing, I was hoping to cover two additional topics:
1) concerns with creating encounter-open/close
2) May Connectathon - do we want a track?
Lets prioritize the encounter one. Track --> yes,
So the meeting starts in 45 min? Same zoom link?

Bas van den Heuvel said:

So the meeting starts in 45 min? Same zoom link?

I have one that fits that criteria - meeting ID is 914 5069 9843 for validation.

Connectathon track proposal is here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-05+FHIRcast

Including an orientation call on Thurs, April 15th a@ 10a Central / 5p CET.

As a note, they have asked us to do orientation calls in Whova this time. They are going to open it up a few weeks prior to the Connectathon to enable that. There are regular calls (every other Tuesday) for track leads to cover all the changes (invite is from Sandy, but I can forward if you don't get one).
fyi - call is starting now.
fyi - call is starting now: https://hl7-org.zoom.us/j/96528303662?pwd=emVIY1Z0Qk5FSk5ZSWFxMTNYMzFNZz09

We are intending to have a FHIRcast call right now, agenda here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=79502176 , but there yet isn't a zoom call setup. As soon as I have a link, I'll post it here.
https://hl7-org.zoom.us/j/95683346462?pwd=VWhhRys1aE9KemVVclI5Q1RERGt4dz09
zoom is online!
@Gino Canessa , @Bas van den Heuvel , @Catie Ladd, @Eric Martin
Are we having today's call? I don't see anything posted on the HL7 site for it. @Isaac Vetter @Bas van den Heuvel @Gino Canessa @Eric Martin @kamal gnanadesikan

I did get an invite but nobody is hosting the meeting.
https://hl7-org.zoom.us/j/3910526094?pwd=QzVuZTJYc2s2S0dUcVpWR3VLNm9tQT09
@Bas van den Heuvel - can you try again?
we have an established recurring call, see here: http://www.hl7.org/concalls/CallDirectory.aspx
Nothing except that I'm swamped with work - it is on our list to do in the near future.
Hey All, fyi, that I'm running ~15 minutes late to our call this morning.
created agenda page, here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=81012032

Isaac, something came up that prevents me from participating. My input:
1 The github pull requests requires your action, it not something I can resolve. The alternative would be to send a new pull request.
2 Next months connecthaton: content exchange and sync recovery.
thanks, @Bas. Can you give me a hint as to how I can resolve the conflict?
Not really. Maybe @Gino Canessa can help. Otherwise I suggest just to try things. We can always do another pull request.

I don't have write access, so can't do anything. Looking at the commits on the master branch, it looks like the conflicts are from merging dependabot changes, which should all be overwritten by the PR anyway (not using mkdocs anymore).

If that's the case, someone with write access just needs to pull the PR to their box, merge in master, discard all the incoming changes, and push it back up.
